sentences.english: Maybe you think it's overstating the problem a bit.
sentences.chinese: 也许你会认为这有点小题大做了。

sentences.english: Don't make mountains out of molehills if you want to avoid conflict.
sentences.chinese: 如果想要避免冲突，不要小题大做。

sentences.english: She really made a meal of it - I can do it myself.
sentences.chinese: 她真是小题大做，我可以自己做的。

sentences.english: So, why all the fuss on the Hill?
sentences.chinese: 那么，何来国会的小题大做？

sentences.english: So why all the fuss about Warren?
sentences.chinese: 那么华理克为什么如此小题大做呢？

sentences.english: Does that strike you as nannyish and make you a little queasy?
sentences.chinese: 这样做会不会小题大做，让你感觉有点儿别扭？

sentences.english: There are so many things which are simple, but someone always wants to make a mountain out of a molehill.
sentences.chinese: 其实很多事情都很简单，但是有些人就会小题大做。

sentences.english: The couple next door are always quarrelling but it is usually a storm in a teacup.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的夫妇经常吵架，但多数是小题大做。

sentences.english: Or was it just a storm in a teacup?
